msIdentifier.idno: Paris, Académie des Inscriptions et des Belles Lettres P. Hercul. 4

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

div.p: This papyrus has been digitally edited by Johannes Kern and revised by Holger Essler within the Würzburger Zentrum für Epikureismusforschung.
